description: Provides connector if this flow is used as a sub flow. All information (links, references) passed between this subflow and the embedding flow are passed through these components.

properties.name: name
properties.label: Name
properties.description: Provide a unique name for this connector.

properties.name: connectortype
properties.label: Connector Type
properties.description: Provide the type of this connector.

properties.name: porttype
properties.label: Port Type
properties.description: A port is created for this link/reference. This port is typed. Please specify a type. Common types are: message, timer, memory, property, json.

properties.name: mandatory
properties.label: Mandatory
properties.description: Check if the connector must be connected.
